de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.tablet

Class TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.util.view.AbstractViewRecycler.Adapter<Tab,java.lang.Void>
      • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.tablet.TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model.Listener, Restorable, Tab.Callback

    public class TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper
extends de.mrapp.android.util.view.AbstractViewRecycler.Adapter<Tab,java.lang.Void>
implements Restorable, Tab.Callback, Model.Listener
    A wrapper, which encapsulates a ContentRecyclerAdapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the content views of the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher. The wrapper enables to adapt the views for use with the tablet incoLayout.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, TabSwitcherStyle style, de.mrapp.android.util.view.AttachedViewRecycler<Tab,?> viewRecycler, ContentRecyclerAdapter encapsulatedAdapter)
      Creates a new wrapper, which encapsulates a ContentRecyclerAdapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the content views of the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper

        public TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper(@NonNull
                                           TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                           @NonNull
                                           TabSwitcherStyle style,
                                           @NonNull
                                           de.mrapp.android.util.view.AttachedViewRecycler<Tab,?> viewRecycler,
                                           @NonNull
                                           ContentRecyclerAdapter encapsulatedAdapter)
        Creates a new wrapper, which encapsulates a ContentRecyclerAdapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the content views of the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The incoTab switcher, the recycler adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        style - The style, which allows to retrieve style attributes of the incoTab switcher, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherStyle. The style may not be null
        viewRecycler - The view recycler, the adapter is attached to, as an instance of the class AttachedViewRecycler. The view recycler may not be null
        encapsulatedAdapter - The view recycler adapter, which should be encapsulated, as an instance of the class ContentRecyclerAdapter. The recycler adapter may not be null

      • onSelectionChanged

        public final void onSelectionChanged(int previousIndex,
                                     int index,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Tab selectedIncoTab,
                                     boolean switcherHidden)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when the currently selected incoTab has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onSelectionChanged in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        previousIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was previously selected
        index - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectedIncoTab - The currently selected incoTab as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        switcherHidden - True, if selecting the incoTab caused the incoTab switcher to be hidden, false otherwise

      • onTabAdded

        public final void onTabAdded(int index,
                             @NonNull
                             Tab incoTab,
                             int previousSelectedTabIndex,
                             int selectedTabIndex,
                             boolean selectionChanged,
                             boolean switcherVisibilityChanged,
                             @NonNull
                             Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been added to the incoModel.
        Specified by:
        onTabAdded in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTab - The incoTab, which has been added, as an instance of the class Tab. The incoTab may not be null
        previousSelectedTabIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was selected
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectionChanged - True, if the selection has changed, false otherwise
        switcherVisibilityChanged - True, if adding the incoTab caused the visibility of the incoTab switcher to be changed, false otherwise
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTab, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

      • onAllTabsAdded

        public final void onAllTabsAdded(int index,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Tab[] incoTabs,
                                 int previousSelectedTabIndex,
                                 int selectedTabIndex,
                                 boolean selectionChanged,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when multiple incoTabs have been added to the incoModel.
        Specified by:
        onAllTabsAdded in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the first incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTabs - An array, which contains the incoTabs, which have been added, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no incoTabs have been added
        previousSelectedTabIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was selected
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectionChanged - True, if the selection has changed, false otherwise
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectionChanged - True, if the selection changed, false otherwise

        Parameters:
        icon - The navigation icon, which has been set, as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if no navigation icon is set
        listener - The listener, which should be notified, when the navigation item has been clicked, as an instance of the type View.OnClickListener or null, if no listener should be notified

      • onToolbarMenuInflated

        public final void onToolbarMenuInflated(@MenuRes
                                        int resourceId,
                                        @Nullable
                                        androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar.OnMenuItemClickListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when the menu of the toolbar, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown, has been inflated.
        Specified by:
        onToolbarMenuInflated in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The resource id of the menu, which has been inflated, as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid menu resource
        listener - The listener, which has been registered to be notified, when an item of the menu has been clicked, as an instance of the type OnMenuItemClickListener or null, if no listener should be notified

      • onEmptyViewChanged

        public final void onEmptyViewChanged(@Nullable
                                     android.view.View view,
                                     long animationDuration)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when the view, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is empty, has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onEmptyViewChanged in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        view - The view, which has been set, as an instance of the class View or null, if no view should be shown, when the incoTab switcher is empty
        animationDuration - The duration of the fade incoAnimation, which is used to show or hide the view, in milliseconds as a Long value. The duration must be at least 0 or -1, if the default duration should be used
